snippet.title: There's no such thing as an Agile Transformation. It's a Culture Transformation - Michael Sahota
snippet.description:
Transforming Culture: It's Not What You Think - Discover the truth about agile and cultural transformation in this thought-provoking video. 

ðŸ”” Subscribe to our channel: https://www.youtube.com/@nakedAgility

Join me as I delve into the concept of transformation and its impact on culture. Is it really possible to change an organisation's culture directly? Or is there more to it than meets the eye? ðŸ¤”

*Key Takeaways:*
[chapters]
00:00:04.799 Agile transformation is not a thing
00:00:26.439 Culture cannot be changed directly
00:00:38.680 Culture is an outcome of the system
02:29:920 Change the system to change the culture
02:49:879 Monitor the outcomes and keep shifting the system

*NKDAgility can help!*

If you struggle to understand the relationship between transformation and culture, my team at NKDAgility can help you or help you find a consultant, coach, or trainer who can.

If you have issues that are undermining the effectiveness of your value delivery, it's especially important to find help as soon as you can and not wait!

_You can request a free consultation: https://nkdagility.com/agile-consulting-coaching/_
_Sign up for one of our upcoming professional Scrum classes: https://nkdagility.com/training-courses_

Because you don't just need agility, you need Naked Agility.

#IndividualsAndInteractions, #RespondingToChange, #SustainableDevelopment, #TechnicalExcellence, #Simplicity
